jobDescription: Our client's Investigations team is seeking an analyst with a penchant for dissecting complex fraud schemes related to data compromise events that include identifying, pinpointing and interpreting complex fraud schemes, and managing external breaches of payment card data.  The analyst will parse large data sets to triangulate common points of purchase and contribute to the development of next-generation methodologies that expedites the investigation of suspected or confirmed fraud loss, theft or compromise of account data.  Must have skills  5+ years experience. Must have a payments background focused in card/consumer fraud or risk assessment, Data Compromise, breach, etc.  Experience with data analytics.  Bachelors Degree.  Must be able to commit to at least 6 month assignment.  Please hit reply and foward a word version of your resume. provided by Dice IND05 data analytics data analyst payments
